description: This file defines a Flutter widget named FiltersSheet, which provides a UI for filtering items based on price range using a RangeSlider, with 'Clear' and 'Apply' buttons. It is a stateless widget that uses StatefulBuilder internally to manage temporary state during user interaction.

classes.name: FiltersSheet
classes.description: A Flutter widget for displaying a price filter modal sheet with range selection and action buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the FiltersSheet, including range sliders and control buttons.
